work.name: Adobe
work.summary: In Adobe we were developing a project for Unified Buying platforms. In which firms can buy adobe products on annual terms. They can check the price and add different adobe products which create a Quote. The Quote is converted to order which can be reviewed. They can also check the terms and conditions for those orders once the review is done there will be a digital signature for the confirmation of the order. After that Billing for the adobe products starts on annual terms
